entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2003/1. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F62: TÁRKI Omnibus 2003/1. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: 1. Gazsó, Tibor
2. Bartók, Béla
entry.dcterms:description: 1) party preferences, popularity of politicians, evaluation of the work of the government and opposition, subjective financial situation, evaluating the economic situation of Hungary 2) car demand and supply, attitude surveys regarding driving a car
entry.dcterms:subject: censuses
economic policy
income, property and savings
mass political behavior, attitudes
family life, marriage, relationship
religion and values
political institutions, public administration
consumption/consumer behavior
person
survey data
cross-section
Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the Leslie Kish key and the random walking method.
face-to-face interview
block 1: A, block 2: D
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
